sentences.sContent: ...the kind of unctuous tone that I've heard often at diplomatic parties.
sentences.sCn: ...我在外交聚会上经常听到的那种虚情假意的腔调。

synos.tran: [食品]油质的；虚情假意的；油腔滑调的

remMethod.val: unct (油) + uous → 油脂的； 油腔滑调的

trans.tranCn: 油质的；虚情假意的；油腔滑调的
trans.tranOther: If you describe someone as unctuous, you are critical of them because they seem to be full of praise, kindness, or interest, but are obviously insincere
